participant_1.name: Emma Johnson
participant_1.personality: Adventurous and resourceful, I enjoy exploring the great outdoors and challenging myself.
participant_1.background: my parents taught me survival skills. i walk dogs for a living. i'm an avid kayaker. i'm also a graduate student.

participant_2.name: Liam Smith
participant_2.personality: Passionate about engineering and the outdoors, I thrive on problem-solving and adventure.
participant_2.background: i live in colorado. i'm a mechanical engineer. i have a black lab named trooper. my favorite activity is rock climbing.
